import React, { useState } from 'react' import '../AddAdmin/AddAdmin.css' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' function AddAdmin() { const [adminData,setAdminData]=useState({}) const handleChange=(e)=>{ setAdminData({...adminData,[e.target.name]:e.target.value}) } return ( <>
